main event: A witness observed a white streak of light low on the horizon for 1 or 2 seconds in Nunica, Michigan.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on the night of 27-28 May 1958., The object moved from west to east., The witness noted a sound of escaping air at the same time as the sighting., There was an odor of auto exhaust gas associated with the observation., The report suggests insufficient data to conclude the nature of the object, which could possibly be meteors.
